thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 16 of 189
thread.title: Cheryl

author: Cheryl
title: Cheryl
text:
We received several qualified applicants and the program is pretty easy to use.
I didn't realize our account would roll into the next month with an auto payment on the expiration date, but I spoke with Les, a ZipRecruiter rep, and he was able to help me with deactivating our account and he gave us a refund for the second month that we hadn't intended to purchase.
We would definitely use ZipRecruiter again in the future.
Cheryl
